sentences.sContent: Most people of European or African ancestry have the "wet" kind: thick and sticky.
sentences.sContent_eng: Most people of European or African ancestry have the "wet" kind: thick and sticky.
sentences.sCn: 大多数欧洲或者非洲血统的人耳垢是湿的，厚的，有粘性的。

sentences.sContent: Martin has shown that, of the eukaryotic genes whose ancestry can be traced, 75 per cent or more came from bacteria rather than the host cell.
sentences.sContent_eng: Martin has shown that, of the eukaryotic genes whose ancestry can be traced, 75 per cent or more came from bacteria rather than the host cell.
sentences.sCn: 马丁揭示，在哪些可以追溯到祖先的线粒体基因上，有75%或更多的成分来自当时外来的细菌而非宿主细胞。

sentences.sContent: You can only explain this by evolutionary common ancestry.
sentences.sContent_eng: You can only explain this by evolutionary common ancestry.
sentences.sCn: 你只能通过存在“进化上的共同祖先”来解释。

words.tran: 女性祖先；女性被继承人

trans.tranOther: the members of your family who lived a long time ago
